bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with shan qi 疝氣 , elevation-illness qi. Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 7: 腎氣虛微，為 邪冷之氣所侵，傳注於小腸，則令小腸連陰疼痛，故號育腸氣也 , “When the qi of the kidneys is depleted, this is because they have been penetrated by evil cold which is then transferred to the small intestine. As a result, the small intestine and, joined to it, the yin [member] are painful. Hence this is called the birth intestine qi ”.
